item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 25, 2025 at 12:25 PM UTC
item.description:

23. New book-sorting algorithm almost reaches perfection (214 points | 46 comments)
24. Ask HN: Why buy domains and 301 redirect them to me? (315 points | 107 comments)

29. Anatomy of a Formal Proof (116 points | 7 comments)
